---
title: "Quick look at salmon data for map"
output: html_notebook
---

Total run size Chum, Central Coast Area 6 and 9
Area 6 = Douglas Kitimat
Area 9 = Rivers Inlet

```{r warning = FALSE}
read_excel("Data/3_Atlasetal2022.xlsx", sheet = 1) %>% 
  filter(CU == "douglas_kitimat") %>% 
  mutate(total_run = as.numeric(total_run)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = total_run)) +
  geom_point()

read_excel("Data/3_Atlasetal2022.xlsx", sheet = 1) %>% 
  filter(CU == "rivers_inlet") %>% 
  mutate(total_run = as.numeric(total_run)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = total_run)) +
  geom_point()
```


Total run size Chinook, South Thompson

```{r}
read.csv("Data/CK_TotalRun_Final.csv") %>% 
  filter(population == "south_thompson_all") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = tot_run)) +
  geom_point()
```

Marine survival Chinook, Robertson Creek

```{r}
read.csv("Data/2_Welchetal2021.csv") %>% 
  filter(Stock == "Robertson") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = SmoltYear, y = SAR)) +
  geom_point()
```
